attributes.action: Make posting a child without primary parents consent a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details:
Over 2,800 children were reported needing protection from sexual abuse (2016-2017)

Over 3,000 NEW grooming offences last year. (2018)

In 2017-2018 1,189 child abductions took place in the UK.

As these numbers begin to rise what will it take to make people realise how dangerous social media is to children/babies?

(Statistics taken from official NSPCC page)
attributes.background:
Posting a child without primary parents permission is not only disrespectful but potentially dangerous.
(Statistics below)

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "posting a child".

If you are concerned about people photographing a child and publishing the photo on social media you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229264
